elementalHybridAbilities.name: Ignite Blade
elementalHybridAbilities.description: You enchant one weapon that you are currently wielding. Each [MARTIAL MELEE ATTACK] made with this weapon deals 1d6 extra fire damage.

elementalHybridAbilities.name: Booming Strike
elementalHybridAbilities.description: Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], the target suffers the attack as normal but in addition regardless if your [ATTACK] succeeds or not a sonic wave is unleashed in a 4.5m Cone that starts from the target. Make a [INT] [SPELL TEST] against the [TOUGHNESS] of the creatures inside the cone. On a success they recieve ([SPI]/2) * d8 sonic damage [HALF].

cosmicHybridAbilities.name: Smite
cosmicHybridAbilities.description: Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], You add 1d6 + ([SPI]/2) * d6 holy damage to the [ATTACK]. If the creature hit is evil and that [ATTACK] exceeds that creatures [TOUGHNESS], it becomes additionally [BLINDED] until the end of your next turn.

cosmicHybridAbilities.name: Unholy Smite
cosmicHybridAbilities.description: Make a Weapon or Unarmed [MELEE MARTIAL ATTACK] or [RANGED MARTIAL ATTACK], You add 1d6 + ([SPI]/2) * d6 holy damage to the [ATTACK]. If that [ATTACK] exceeds that creatures [TOUGHNESS] it becomes additionally [CRIPPLED] until the end of your next turn.
